title: Marketplace Roundtable 35: Apple And The New Chip Paradigm With Mark Hibben
description: On the latest Marketplace Roundtable podcast, Mark Hibben (of Rethink Technology) sits down with Seeking Alpha's Jonathan Liss to walk listeners through his unique approach to picking tech stocks. Mark incisively identifies and dissects key trends in tech - and how they are likely to play out in the stock market. In the wide-ranging conversation that follows, Mark touches on everything from what he sees as the new chip paradigm to Apple's recently concluded WWDC and the ongoing China trade war.
itunes:title: Apple And The New Chip Paradigm With Mark Hibben
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: A technologist's view of key tech trends and how to play them in the market
